## Token."4" property

Extra data

**Signature:**

```typescript
4: U;
```

## Remarks

This holds the parsed value of each token. These values are unescaped, unquoted, converted to numbers, etc.

You should always use this field when analyzing the token. But you must not assume that mutating only this field will have any effect.
